channel.title: RevolutionX[HELP]
channel.description:
Hello, i am trying to use RevolutionX i got the source but the client is not loading i got the client and cache
but when i try a dif client it work but when i stay in game about 1min it freeze help
When i use RevolutionX Client it dont let me log it all it does it say connection error - Retrying in
